title: The Night Gwen Stacy Died
description: An offbeat love story about the adventures and mutual rescue of a young woman out of place in her hometown and a mysterious stranger who calls himself Peter Parker (and begins to cast her in the role of Spider-Manâ€™s first sweetheart), The Night Gwen Stacy Died is about first loss, first love, and finding our real identities.
author: Sarah Bruni
